job.title: Software Engineer Mobile (React)
job.description: <p>Our CONFIDENTIAL, venture-backed, growth client is hiring a Senior Mobile Engineer (React Native) who has a strong aptitude for identifying opportunities to improve user experience, robust experience translating design into code, and a proactive desire to collaborate with fellow developers, designers, and product managers to build amazing apps. Position is full-time either in NYC, Chicago, LA, SF, or Portland and will report to the Manager of Mobile Engineering.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to design and deliver high-quality products on iOS and Android</li><li>Build efficient and reusable UI components and architect reliable, performant, and maintainable solutions</li><li>Lead teams that continuously build, ship, learn, and iterate.</li><li>Drive technical innovation, processes, and best practices required to deliver best-in-class mobile applications</li><li>Mentor and develop a high-performing team of engineers</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>You have at least 4 years of experience building mobile applications</li><li>You have used React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications</li><li>You are comfortable working with JavaScript/Typescript, but also not afraid to jump into Swift or Kotlin as needed</li><li>You have knowledge of mobile best practices and stay informed about innovations in the mobile industry</li><li>You have a strong understanding of UX/UI concepts and a demonstrated record of design sensibility</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Experience working with Bitcoin, Ethereum, and/or blockchain technology a huge plus</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Once you apply, we’ll send you all company information and a highlight of their leadership team.</p>
